1{-# LANGUAGE RecordWildCards #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Code scanner.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Code.Scan
7  ( -- * Type
8    CodeScan (..), CodeScanMap, WordTable,
9
10    -- * Function
11    isBol,
12    codeScanSave, codeScanRestore,
13    codeScanUp, codeScanUpBz,
14    codeUpdate, codeUpdateWords,
15    codeUpdateList, codeUpdateListWords,
16    codeChange,
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Data.Map                             as Map
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture             as O
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO              as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude         as B
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Code.Line       as B
24
25
26-- | Code scanner divides input text into output tokens.
27data CodeScan i o = CodeScan
28     { codeMapSaved :: [CodeScanMap i o]  -- ^ Saved updater
29     , codeMap      :: CodeScanMap i o    -- ^ Updater
30     , codeInputPt  :: B.CodePos          -- ^ Code position
31     , codeInput    :: i                  -- ^ Input text
32     , codeOutput   :: [o]                -- ^ Output tokens
33     , codeWords    :: WordTable          -- ^ Collected words
34     }
35
36-- | Return 'codeInputPt'.
37instance B.GetCodePos (CodeScan i o) where
38    getCPs cp = [codeInputPt cp]
39    getCP  cp = codeInputPt cp
40
41-- | Update code scanner.
42type CodeScanMap i o = O.Map (CodeScan i o)
43
44-- | Collected words.
45type WordTable = Map.Map String String
46
47-- | Test scanner at the beginning of line, i.e., no output collected.
48isBol :: O.Test (CodeScan i o)
49isBol CodeScan {..} = null codeOutput
50
51-- | Save current updater.
52codeScanSave :: CodeScanMap i o
53codeScanSave sc@CodeScan { codeMapSaved = fs, codeMap = f } =
54    sc { codeMapSaved = f : fs }
55
56-- | Restore saved updater.
57codeScanRestore :: CodeScanMap i o
58codeScanRestore sc =
59    case codeMapSaved sc of
60      []      -> sc
61      f : fs  -> sc { codeMapSaved = fs, codeMap = f }
62
63-- | Split source text into 'B.CodeLine' list.
64--
65--   1. Split source text into lines by line delimiters
66--      (carriage return @\\r@ or line feed @\\n@).
67--
68--   2. Numbering lines from 1.
69--      Internally, this is represented as
70--      a list of pairs @(@'B.LineNumber'@, @'String'@)@.
71--
72--   3. Tokenize each lines,
73--      and put tokens together in 'B.CodeLine'.
74--
75codeScanUp :: CodeScanMap String o -> B.NIOPoint -> String -> [B.CodeLine o]
76codeScanUp f nio = codeScanUpLines f nio . B.linesCrlfNumbered
77
78-- | Lazy bytestring version of 'codeScanUp'.
79codeScanUpBz :: CodeScanMap String o -> B.NIOPoint -> B.Bz -> [B.CodeLine o]
80codeScanUpBz f nio = codeScanUpLines f nio . B.linesCrlfBzNumbered
81
82codeScanUpLines :: CodeScanMap String o -> B.NIOPoint -> [B.NumberedLine] -> [B.CodeLine o]
83codeScanUpLines f nio = loop (CodeScan [] f cp "" [] Map.empty) where
84    cp    = B.def { B.cpSource = nio }
85
86    loop _ [] = []
87    loop r ((num, line) : ls) =
88       let cp'  = setCodePos num line cp
89           r'   = codeScan $ setScan cp' line r
90           toks = reverse $ codeOutput r'
91           ls'  = loop r' ls
92       in B.CodeLine num line toks : ls'
93
94setCodePos :: B.LineNumber -> String -> O.Map B.CodePos
95setCodePos num line cp =
96    cp { B.cpLineNo    = num
97       , B.cpLineText  = line
98       , B.cpText      = line }
99
100setScan :: B.CodePos -> i -> CodeScan i o -> CodeScan i o
101setScan cp line sc =
102    sc { codeInputPt = cp
103       , codeInput   = line
104       , codeOutput  = [] }
105
106codeScan :: CodeScanMap String o
107codeScan sc@CodeScan { codeMap = f, codeInputPt = cp, codeInput = input }
108    | null input  = call
109    | otherwise   = codeScan call
110    where call    = f sc { codeInputPt = setText input cp }
111
112setText :: String -> O.Map B.CodePos
113setText text cp = cp { B.cpText = text }
114
115-- | Update 'codeInput' and push result element to 'codeOutput'.
116codeUpdate :: i -> o -> CodeScanMap i o
117codeUpdate cs tok sc =
118    sc { codeInput  = cs
119       , codeOutput = tok : codeOutput sc }
120
121-- | Update code scanner with word table.
122codeUpdateWords :: WordTable -> i -> o -> CodeScanMap i o
123codeUpdateWords ws cs tok sc =
124    sc { codeInput  = cs
125       , codeOutput = tok : codeOutput sc
126       , codeWords  = ws }
127
128-- | Multi-element version of 'codeUpdate'.
129codeUpdateList :: i -> [o] -> CodeScanMap i o
130codeUpdateList cs toks sc =
131    sc { codeInput  = cs
132       , codeOutput = toks ++ codeOutput sc }
133
134-- | Multi-element and cached version of 'codeUpdate'.
135codeUpdateListWords :: WordTable -> i -> [o] -> CodeScanMap i o
136codeUpdateListWords ws cs toks sc =
137    sc { codeInput  = cs
138       , codeOutput = toks ++ codeOutput sc
139       , codeWords  = ws }
140
141-- | Change mapper of code sc.
142codeChange :: O.Map (CodeScanMap i o)
143codeChange f sc = sc { codeMap = f }
144
